column1: Little Goat Diner////I'm trying to think back to the last "meh" omelette I've had and I can't remember
column3: I think all omelettes are fantastic.  However
column4: I actually thought the Spanish Omelette here was almost gross.  It's about a foot long of peppers and eggs.  If you don't like peppers
column6: it's all egg and pepper.  Then on top they  added Dorrito tasting chips which were probably the best part
column7: with what looked like a can of stewed tomatoes.  The home fries were nothing special either.
